verses.verse: The wilderness <WH4057> and the solitary place <WH6723> shall be glad <WH7797> <WH8799> for them; and the desert <WH6160> shall rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>, and blossom <WH6524> <WH8799> as the rose <WH2261>.

It shall blossom <WH6524> <WH8799> abundantly <WH6524> <WH8800>, and rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799> even with joy <WH1525> and singing <WH7444> <WH8763>: the glory <WH3519> of Lebanon <WH3844> shall be given <WH5414> <WH8738> unto it, the excellency <WH1926> of Karmel <WH3760> and Sharon <WH8289>, they shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068>, and the excellency <WH1926> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.
Strengthen <WH2388> <WH8761> ye the weak <WH7504> hands <WH3027>, and confirm <WH553> <WH8761> the feeble <WH3782> <WH8802> knees <WH1290>.

Say <WH559> <WH8798> to them that are of a fearful <WH4116> <WH8737> heart <WH3820>, Be strong <WH2388> <WH8798>, fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: behold, your 'Elohim <WH430> will come <WH935> <WH8799> with vengeance <WH5359>, even 'Elohim <WH430> with a recompence <WH1576>; he will come <WH935> <WH8799> and save <WH3467> <WH8686> you.
Then the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> shall be opened <WH6491> <WH8735>, and the ears <WH241> of the deaf <WH2795> shall be unstopped <WH6605> <WH8735>.

Then shall the lame <WH6455> man leap <WH1801> <WH8762> as an hart <WH354>, and the tongue <WH3956> of the dumb <WH483> sing <WH7442> <WH8799>: for in the wilderness <WH4057> shall waters <WH4325> break out <WH1234> <WH8738>, and streams <WH5158> in the desert <WH6160>.

And the parched ground <WH8273> shall become a pool <WH98>, and the thirsty land <WH6774> springs <WH4002> of water <WH4325>: in the habitation <WH5116> of dragons <WH8577>, where each lay <WH7258>, shall be grass <WH2682> with reeds <WH7070> and rushes <WH1573>.

And an highway <WH4547> shall be there, and a way <WH1870>, and it shall be called <WH7121> <WH8735> The way <WH1870> of holiness <WH6944>; the unclean <WH2931> shall not pass over <WH5674> <WH8799> it; but it shall be for those: the wayfaring men <WH1980> <WH8802>, though fools <WH191>, shall not err <WH8582> <WH8799> therein.

No lion <WH738> shall be there, nor any ravenous <WH6530> beast <WH2416> shall go up <WH5927> <WH8799> thereon, it shall not be found <WH4672> <WH8735> there; but the redeemed <WH1350> <WH8803> shall walk <WH1980> <WH8804> there:

And the ransomed <WH6299> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799>, and come <WH935> <WH8804> to TZiyon <WH6726> with songs <WH7440> and everlasting <WH5769> joy <WH8057> upon their heads <WH7218>: they shall obtain <WH5381> <WH8686> joy <WH8057> and gladness <WH8342>, and sorrow <WH3015> and sighing <WH585> shall flee away <WH5127> <WH8804>.
